Literature.Title: Antiviral, Antimicrobial, and Cytotoxic Properties of Peptavirins A and B Produced by Apiocrea sp.14T
Literature.Author: Kim YH, Yeo WH, Kim YS, Lee SJ, Yoo ID, Kim KS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(no activity data),Candida albicans IAM 4905(no activity data),Pyricularia grisea IFO 5994(no activity data),Colletotrichum lagenaria IFO 7513(no activity data),Fusarium solani(no activity data),Mucor racemosus(no activity data),Alternaria mali IFO 8594(no activity data),Tobacco mosaic virus (TMV)(90-100% Inhibition=100µg/ml),Tobacco mosaic virus (TMV)(70-80% Inhibition=10µg/ml),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=3.96µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=5.73µg/ml),Human melanoma UACC-62(IC50=3.29µg/ml),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=3.47µg/ml)
